data.eml:eml: Description of a new Pergalumna (Acari: Oribatida: Galumnidae) species from Mexico and its postembryonic development

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Páez, Jair, Villagomez, Fernando, Palacios-Vargas, Jóse G. (2019): Description of a new Pergalumna (Acari: Oribatida: Galumnidae) species from Mexico and its postembryonic development. Zootaxa 4647 (1): 385-406, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4647.1.25
